import React,{useState}from'react';import{Layout,Menu,Typography}from'antd';import{StockOutlined,BarChartOutlined}from'@ant-design/icons';import{BrowserRouter as Router,Routes,Route,useNavigate,useParams,Navigate}from'react-router-dom';import StockNavigation from'./components/StockNavigation';import StockInfo from'./components/StockInfo';import NewsPanel from'./components/NewsPanel';import FundamentalAnalysis from'./components/FundamentalAnalysis';import SectorInfo from'./components/SectorInfo';import InvestmentAdvice from'./components/InvestmentAdvice';import RelatedStocks from'./components/RelatedStocks';import ApiTestComponent from'./components/ApiTestComponent';import{getAllStockSymbols}from'./data/stocksData';import'./App.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const{Header,Sider,Content}=Layout;const{Title}=Typography;// 主布局组件
const AppLayout=()=>{const stockSymbols=getAllStockSymbols();const navigate=useNavigate();const{symbol=stockSymbols[0]||'NVDA',page='overview'}=useParams();const[collapsed,setCollapsed]=useState(false);const menuItems=[{key:'overview',icon:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(StockOutlined,{}),label:'股票概览'},{key:'news',icon:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(BarChartOutlined,{}),label:'新闻消息'},{key:'analysis',icon:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(BarChartOutlined,{}),label:'基本面分析'},{key:'sector',icon:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(BarChartOutlined,{}),label:'板块信息'},{key:'advice',icon:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(BarChartOutlined,{}),label:'投资建议'},{key:'related',icon:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(BarChartOutlined,{}),label:'关联股票'},{key:'api-test',icon:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(BarChartOutlined,{}),label:'API测试'}];// 处理股票选择
const handleStockChange=newSymbol=>{navigate("/stock/".concat(newSymbol,"/").concat(page));};// 处理菜单选择
const handleMenuClick=_ref=>{let{key}=_ref;navigate("/stock/".concat(symbol,"/").concat(key));};// 获取当前页面的标题
const getPageTitle=()=>{const menuItem=menuItems.find(item=>item.key===page);return menuItem?menuItem.label:'股票概览';};// 渲染内容组件
const renderContent=()=>{switch(page){case'overview':return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(StockInfo,{symbol:symbol});case'news':return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(NewsPanel,{symbol:symbol});case'analysis':return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FundamentalAnalysis,{symbol:symbol});case'sector':return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(SectorInfo,{symbol:symbol});case'advice':return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(InvestmentAdvice,{symbol:symbol});case'related':return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(RelatedStocks,{symbol:symbol});case'api-test':return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ApiTestComponent,{symbol:symbol});default:return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(StockInfo,{symbol:symbol});}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Layout,{style:{minHeight:'100vh'},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Sider,{collapsible:true,collapsed:collapsed,onCollapse:setCollapsed,width:250,style:{background:'#fff',boxShadow:'2px 0 8px rgba(0,0,0,0.1)'},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{style:{padding:'16px',borderBottom:'1px solid #f0f0f0'},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Title,{level:4,style:{margin:0,textAlign:'center'},children:collapsed?'股票':'股票分析平台'})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(StockNavigation,{selectedStock:symbol,onStockChange:handleStockChange,collapsed:collapsed}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Menu,{mode:"inline",selectedKeys:[page],style:{borderRight:0,marginTop:'16px'},items:menuItems,onClick:handleMenuClick})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Layout,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Header,{style:{background:'#fff',padding:'0 24px',boxShadow:'0 2px 8px rgba(0,0,0,0.1)',display:'flex',alignItems:'center',justifyContent:'space-between'},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Title,{level:3,style:{margin:0},children:[symbol," - ",getPageTitle()]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Content,{style:{margin:'24px',padding:'24px',background:'#fff',borderRadius:'8px',boxShadow:'0 2px 8px rgba(0,0,0,0.1)',minHeight:'calc(100vh - 112px)',overflow:'auto'},children:renderContent()})]})]});};// 主App组件
const App=()=>{return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Router,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Routes,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Route,{path:"/",element:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Navigate,{to:"/stock/NVDA/overview",replace:true})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Route,{path:"/stock/:symbol/:page",element:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(AppLayout,{})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Route,{path:"/stock/:symbol",element:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(AppLayout,{})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Route,{path:"*",element:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Navigate,{to:"/stock/NVDA/overview",replace:true})})]})});};export default App;
